about_the_game:
The year is 1953. Millions of Korean comrades, most of them men, lie dead at the feet of US-backed capitalists. You were plucked from your kitchen along with the rest of your comrades, and stand ready to defend your country from NATO aggression.

Protect the DPRK's future in this roguelike FPS

- Liquidate as many capitalists as possible using North Korea's finest firearms, such as the Kalashnizon!

- Earn ration tickets, and launder them into USD to buy buffs from allied foreign powers!

- Battle a variety of bosses who have dishonored the great DPRK!

Should you do well enough in your struggle against the imperialists, the Dear Leader may just see fit to whisk you away from your peasant life and......(that's where the breeding comes in ;)).

content_descriptors.notes:
Game contains cartoon violence, suicide, profane language and implied sexual acts.

There is no actual nudity or graphic sexual content in the game however.

detailed_description:
The year is 1953. Millions of Korean comrades, most of them men, lie dead at the feet of US-backed capitalists. You were plucked from your kitchen along with the rest of your comrades, and stand ready to defend your country from NATO aggression.

Protect the DPRK's future in this roguelike FPS

Should you do well enough in your struggle against the imperialists, the Dear Leader may just see fit to whisk you away from your peasant life and......(that's where the breeding comes in ;)).
legal_notice: All characters in this game are fictitious.
name: Breed Kim Il-Sung

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 169 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: With millions of men dead as a result of the Korean War, the Dear Leader needs YOU to help rebuild the glorious DPRK in this action-roguelike FPS. Liquidate capitalist agitators to earn veneration from the Kims and ensure their bloodline perseveres to see a future free from imperialist aggression!
